Away team alias.description: Abbreviation of the name of the away team.

Home team alias.description: Abbreviation of the name of the home team.

Time in seconds.description: Time elasped on the game clock, in seconds.

Jersey number.description: The number of the player who took the shot.

Inches from left baseline.description: Distance from the left baseline (the line behind a basket).

Inches from bottom sideline.description: Distance from the bottom sideline (the line along the length of the court).

Made or miss.description: Whether the 3-point shot was made or missed.
